text: in order to bring to the classroom the
realities of micro Finance the provision
of financial services to low-income
people we thought about
filming uh
worldclass institution devoted to this
field in this case it was mango the
leading micr Finance Bank in Peru a
pioneer of micro Finance both in Latin
America and around the
world we filmed in open air markets we
filmed people that were uh in lowincome
neighborhoods we filmed the street
outside we talked to the clients
themselves and that often is very
different from the type of uh segment
that either conventional Bankers or MBA
students are used to thinking
about on the other hand the people that
are in charge charge of these
institutions are consumate
professionals and so we wanted to film
also the way that they look at what they
do bringing the reality of a worldclass
micr finance Bank to the classroom was
really uh valuable and I think it met
all the objectives that we wanted uh it
established a level of analysis and
dialogue that uh uh much faster
uh than it would have otherwise been
possible the ability to speed up that
conversation so that
preconceptions are dispelled way early
in that process uh is very important in
having the remainder of that time to get
to other topics with greater depth
